channel.title: Need help with my downloadable client
channel.description: Hey well people cant login into my downloadable client and every the type in there user and pass and says error connecting to server. could somebody show me on team viewer how to do it or do it for me. thanks

item.title: Need help with my downloadable client
item.dc:creator: @DannyC DannyC
item.source: Need help with my downloadable client

item.title: Need help with my downloadable client
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Just go in to the client.java, search for server ip or sometimes you can search for 127.0.0.1 or localhost, and change the ip to your ip or the hosters ip if you arn’t hosting. Then save and compile and re-run. If they still can’t connect then its not the client thats the problem, its probably your port forwarding.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my downloadable client
